name: main

definition.annotation: This workflow performs quality control and trimming on paired-end Illumina fastq(.gz) files using fastp and aggregates the quality control reports with MultiQC
definition.name: Short-read quality control and trimming
definition.readme:
Before starting any analysis, it is always a good idea to assess the quality of the input data and to discard poor-quality base content by trimming and filtering reads.

This workflow takes paired-end Illumina (**short-reads**) fastq(.gz) files and executes the following steps:
1. Quality control and trimming using **fastp**
2. Aggregation of the quality control reports using **MultiQC**

6.label: MultiQC
6.name: MultiQC

readme:
# Short-read quality control and trimming

Before starting any analysis, it is always a good idea to assess the quality of the input data and to discard poor-quality base content by trimming and filtering reads.

This workflow takes paired-end Illumina (**short-reads**) fastq(.gz) files and executes the following steps:
1. Quality control and trimming using **fastp**
2. Aggregation of the quality control reports using **MultiQC**

## Input Datasets

- A list of paired datasets corresponding to paired-end raw reads in `fastqsanger` or `fastqsanger.gz` format.
- Qualified quality score: The quality value that a base is qualified to have.
- Minimal read length: Reads shorter than this value will be discarded.
- Cutting mean quality: The bases in the sliding window with mean quality below this value will be cut.
- [Optional] Adapter to remove on forward reads and reverse reads

## Output Datasets

- A list of paired datasets corresponding to paired-end **trimmed** reads in `fastqsanger` or `fastqsanger.gz`, ready for further analysis.
- List of `JSON` reports of fastp for each sample that could be used as inputs for extra MultiQC
- MultiQC report in HTML
changelog:
# Changelog

## [0.2] - 2025-12-08

### Automatic update
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/fastp/fastp/1.0.1+galaxy2` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/fastp/fastp/1.0.1+galaxy3`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/multiqc/multiqc/1.24.1+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/multiqc/multiqc/1.27+galaxy4`
   
## [0.1] 2025-10-07
   
First release.
diagram_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 900 420" role="img" aria-label="Short-read QC and trimming workflow diagram">
  <title>Short-Read Quality Control and Trimming</title>
  <desc>Paired-end Illumina short-read preprocessing: fastp quality control and adapter trimming followed by MultiQC report aggregation. Produces trimmed reads and a comprehensive QC report.</desc>

  <defs>
    <pattern id="grid" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 20 0 L 0 0 0 20" fill="none" stroke="#c5d5e4" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    <pattern id="grid-major" width="100" height="100" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="url(#grid)"/>
      <path d="M 100 0 L 0 0 0 100" fill="none" stroke="#b0c4d8" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    <style>
      .connection { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 4; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .connection-qc { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 5 3; }
      .connection-secondary { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .node-card { filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)); }
    </style>
  </defs>

  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="900" height="420" fill="#f8f9fa"/>
  <rect width="900" height="420" fill="url(#grid-major)"/>

  <!-- Title bar -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="900" height="45" fill="#25537b"/>
  <text x="20" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="16" font-weight="600" fill="white">Short-Read QC & Trimming</text>
  <text x="280" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="12" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">Paired-End Illumina Read Preprocessing</text>

  <!-- ==================== CONNECTIONS ==================== -->

  <!-- Raw reads → fastp -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 200 135 C 260 135, 270 135, 320 135"/>

  <!-- fastp → Trimmed Reads output -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 520 135 C 570 135, 630 135, 680 135"/>

  <!-- fastp QC → MultiQC -->
  <path class="connection-qc" d="M 420 225 C 420 270, 320 290, 320 320"/>

  <!-- MultiQC → QC Report output -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 420 390 C 420 395, 600 395, 680 360"/>

  <!-- ==================== NODES ==================== -->

  <!-- NODE: Raw Reads (Input - Gold) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(20, 90)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="180" height="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(44,49,67,0.6)">1:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143">Raw Reads</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Paired Collection</text>
    <text x="90" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">PE Illumina FASTQ(.gz)</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- NODE: fastp (Processing - Blue) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(320, 90)">
    <rect width="200" height="135" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="200" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">2:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="700" fill="white">fastp</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#495057">Quality Control & Trimming</text>
    <text x="100" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Adapter removal</text>
    <text x="100" y="86" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Quality filtering</text>
    <text x="100" y="100" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Length filtering</text>
    <line x1="10" y1="110" x2="190" y2="110" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2 2"/>
    <text x="100" y="125" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057">Trimmed reads + JSON report</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="100" cy="135" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  </g>

  <!-- NODE: MultiQC (Report - Green) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(220, 320)">
    <rect width="200" height="70" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="200" height="24" rx="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <rect x="0" y="20" width="200" height="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <text x="10" y="17" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">MultiQC</text>
    <text x="100" y="45" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Aggregated QC Report</text>
    <text x="100" y="60" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">All samples in one report</text>
    <circle cx="100" cy="0" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="35" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  </g>

  <!-- NODE: Trimmed Reads (Output - Orange) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(680, 105)">
    <rect width="130" height="55" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="130" height="20" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="16" width="130" height="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="65" y="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white">Trimmed Reads</text>
    <text x="65" y="36" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">PE FASTQ collection</text>
    <text x="65" y="48" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">Ready for analysis</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="30" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- NODE: QC Report (Output - Orange) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(680, 330)">
    <rect width="130" height="55" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="130" height="20" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="16" width="130" height="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="65" y="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white">QC Report</text>
    <text x="65" y="36" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">MultiQC HTML</text>
    <text x="65" y="48" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">Interactive summary</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="30" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Legend -->
  <g transform="translate(150, 395)">
    <text x="0" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#495057">Legend:</text>
    <rect x="60" y="-10" width="14" height="14" rx="2" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <text x="80" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Input</text>
    <line x1="120" y1="-4" x2="160" y2="-4" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <text x="168" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Data flow</text>
    <line x1="240" y1="-4" x2="280" y2="-4" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-dasharray="5 3"/>
    <text x="288" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">QC metrics</text>
    <rect x="360" y="-10" width="14" height="14" rx="2" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <text x="380" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Output</text>
    <rect x="430" y="-10" width="14" height="14" rx="2" fill="white" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <text x="450" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Report</text>
  </g>

</svg>
